publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1377 Chris Ballance: Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition-That the Parliament congratulates Fiona Scott and Ian Smith of Kirkcudbright Academy on winning the ESU Scotland National Juniors Debating Competition and recommends that school debating should be a central part of the Scottish Executive's citizenship agenda.
S2M-1377 Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition (lodged on 1 June 2004) Scott Barrie*

S2M-1377 Chris Ballance: Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition-That the Parliament congratulates Fiona Scott and Ian Smith of Kirkcudbright Academy on winning the ESU Scotland National Juniors Debating Competition and recommends that school debating should be a central part of the Scottish Executive's citizenship agenda. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Mark Ballard*

S2M-1377 Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition (lodged on 1 June 2004) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Robin Harper*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Christine Grahame*, Shiona Baird*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-1377 Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition (lodged on 1 June 2004) Bill Butler*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1377 Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition (lodged on 1 June 2004) Mike Pringle*
S2M-1377 Congratulations on Winning National Debating Competition (lodged on 1 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
